Module SpiderCrisis
Package Main

Class Spider

java.lang.Object
Main.Spider
public class Spider extends Object
Date: June 8, 2023

Version 1.0 of the Spider class, a class that represents a spider. Provided by JELTech Industries.

Version:
23.06.08
Author:
Lexi Han

Class: ICS4UO with V. Krasteva

  • Constructor Details

    • Spider

      public Spider(int x, int y, int w, Rectangle r, ImageIcon img)
      Constructor to initialize variables.
      Parameters:
      x - The top left x-coordinate.
      y - The top left y-coordinate.
      w - The width of the spider.
      r - the boundary in which the spider resides.
      img - the image of the spider to display.

  • Method Details

    • randomizeCords

      public void randomizeCords()
      Method to randomize coordinates of spider.

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(boolean b)
      Method to set whether the spider has been caught or not.
      Parameters:
      b - The Boolean value stating True if the spider is caught.

    • setCoordinates

      public void setCoordinates(int x, int y)
      Method to set the coordinates of the spider's top left most point.
      Parameters:
      x - The top left most x-coordinate.
      y - The top left most y-coordinate.

    • getHitBox

      public Rectangle getHitBox()
      Method that returns the hit box of the spider.
      Returns:
      A Rectangle that represents the spider's hit box.

    • isCaught

      public boolean isCaught(int mouseX, int mouseY)
      Method that determines if the user catches the spider.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - The x-coordinate of the mouse point.
      mouseY - The y-coordinate of the mouse point.
      Returns:
      true if the mouse point is within the hit box of the spider.

    • isRemoved

      public boolean isRemoved()
      Method that checks if the spider is not present in the room.
      Returns:
      True if the spider is already caught.

    • getImg

      public Image getImg()
      Method to return the image of the spider.
      Returns:
      Image of spider.

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Method to return top left most x-coordinate.
      Returns:
      X position of spider.

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Method to return top left most y-coordinate.
      Returns:
      Y position of spider.

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Method to return the width of the spider.
      Returns:
      Width of spider.

    • getBounds

      public Rectangle getBounds()
      Method to return boundaries where the spider can be found.
      Returns:
      Rectangle representing boundaries of spider.
